all.title: App version outdated
all.message: Please update to the latest version of the SODA by using our autoupdate feature or download from here.

win32.title: Welcome to version 9.0.0 for Windows!
win32.message:
New features have been added!
  • Guided mode is now available! Curate datasets with more ease!
  • You can now import hidden files to your dataset (.DS_Store files are not accepted).
  • README.txt is now a mandatory metadata file for all datasets.
  • inputs and outputs metadata have been replaced with code_parameters as per the SDS 2.0
